plx:passParam.plx:string: All objects in a relationship must be part of the same Context.

plx:right.plx:string: SELECT * FROM BlogDemo.BlogEntryLabel WHERE blogEntryId_BlogEntry_Id = @blogEntryIdBlogEntry_Id and blogLabelId_BlogLabel_Id = @blogLabelIdBlogLabel_Id
SELECT * FROM BlogDemo.User WHERE firstName = @firstName and lastName = @lastName

UPDATE BlogDemo.BlogEntryLabel SET blogEntryId_BlogEntry_Id = @NewblogEntryIdBlogEntry_Id WHERE blogEntryId_BlogEntry_Id = @blogEntryIdBlogEntry_Id AND blogLabelId_BlogLabel_Id = @blogLabelIdBlogLabel_Id

UPDATE BlogDemo.BlogEntryLabel SET blogLabelId_BlogLabel_Id = @NewblogLabelIdBlogLabel_Id WHERE blogEntryId_BlogEntry_Id = @blogEntryIdBlogEntry_Id AND blogLabelId_BlogLabel_Id = @blogLabelIdBlogLabel_Id

plx:string.plx:string: INSERT INTO BlogDemo.BlogEntry (BlogEntry_Id, entryTitle, entryBody, postedDate_MDYValue, userId_firstName, userId_lastName) VALUES (@BlogEntry_Id, @entryTitle, @entryBody, @postedDate_MDYValue, @userIdfirstName, @userIdlastName)

plx:right.plx:string: UPDATE BlogDemo.BlogEntry SET BlogEntry_Id = @NewBlogEntry_Id WHERE BlogEntry_Id = @BlogEntry_Id
UPDATE BlogDemo.BlogEntry SET entryTitle = @NewentryTitle WHERE BlogEntry_Id = @BlogEntry_Id
UPDATE BlogDemo.BlogEntry SET entryBody = @NewentryBody WHERE BlogEntry_Id = @BlogEntry_Id
UPDATE BlogDemo.BlogEntry SET postedDate_MDYValue = @NewpostedDate_MDYValue WHERE BlogEntry_Id = @BlogEntry_Id
UPDATE BlogDemo.BlogEntry SET userId_firstName = @NewuserIdfirstName WHERE BlogEntry_Id = @BlogEntry_Id
UPDATE BlogDemo.BlogEntry SET BlogComment_BlogEntry_Id = @NewBlogCommentBlogEntry_Id WHERE BlogEntry_Id = @BlogEntry_Id
UPDATE BlogDemo.BlogEntry SET NonCommentEntry_BlogEntry_Id = @NewNonCommentEntryBlogEntry_Id WHERE BlogEntry_Id = @BlogEntry_Id

plx:string.plx:string: INSERT INTO BlogDemo.User (firstName, lastName, username, password) VALUES (@firstName, @lastName, @username, @password)

plx:right.plx:string: UPDATE BlogDemo.User SET firstName = @NewfirstName WHERE firstName = @firstName AND lastName = @lastName
UPDATE BlogDemo.User SET lastName = @NewlastName WHERE firstName = @firstName AND lastName = @lastName
UPDATE BlogDemo.User SET username = @Newusername WHERE firstName = @firstName AND lastName = @lastName
UPDATE BlogDemo.User SET password = @Newpassword WHERE firstName = @firstName AND lastName = @lastName
